name: Kamisato Ayaka
desc:
"Frostflake Heron" Kamisato Ayaka

As graceful as the frost drifting in the wind, as elegant as a heron perched in a courtyard.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 4 <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> , summons 1 <color=#ffffff>Frostflake Seki no To</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) When switched to be the active character, this character gains <color=#ffffff>Cryo Elemental Infusion</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Cryo Elemental Infusion</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character to which this is attached has their <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt converted to <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> .
(Lasts until the Round ends)

Applies Cryo and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG+1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives Physical or Pyro DMG, in which case they will take +2 DMG)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.

customize.name: Kamisato Ayaka
customize.desc:
"Frostflake Heron" Kamisato Ayaka

As graceful as the frost drifting in the wind, as elegant as a heron perched in a courtyard.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"The specifics of the game are a little unclear to me, and I've only watched my brother play... But if it's your request..."
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Ayaka's deck comes with a lot of Sword Weapons and she excels at using Sword characters to go on the offensive.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Kamisato Ayaka
customize.desc:
"Frostflake Heron" Kamisato Ayaka

As graceful as the frost drifting in the wind, as elegant as a heron perched in a courtyard.

customize.name: Chongyun
customize.desc:
"Frozen Ardor" Chongyun

"Ugh, summer… Please pass us by in peace…"

customize.name: Xingqiu
customize.desc:
"Juvenile Galant" Xingqiu

"Is it just me, or are the protagonists in novels nowadays all students of some private school or another..."

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Kamisato Ayaka
customize.desc:
"Frostflake Heron" Kamisato Ayaka

As graceful as the frost drifting in the wind, as elegant as a heron perched in a courtyard.

customize.name: Kanten Senmyou Blessing
customize.desc:
Kamisato Ayaka: Kanten Senmyo Blessing

The heron holds upon the ice on elegant wing.

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Kanten Senmyou Blessing
customize.desc:
Kamisato Ayaka: Kanten Senmyo Blessing

The heron holds upon the ice on elegant wing.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"So Genius Invokation TCG can also be considered a battlefield. Well then, I shan't be careless either..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Kamisato Ayaka" starts with the Talent Card "Kanten Senmyou Blessing" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

value.name: Kanten Senmyou Blessing
value.desc:
Kamisato Ayaka: Kanten Senmyo Blessing

The heron holds upon the ice on elegant wing.

value.text: Reward for inviting Kamisato Ayaka to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Kamisato Ayaka
value.desc: Daughter of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Dignified and elegant, as well as wise and strong.
